story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Briki was born from a simple observation: buying insurance in Latin America is unnecessarily complex. Forms filled with jargon, endless phone calls, and policies that seem designed to confuse rather than protect.
story.paragraph2: We believed there had to be a better way. So we built one. Using artificial intelligence and a deep understanding of the insurance market, we created a platform that speaks your language and puts your needs first.
story.paragraph3: Today, Briki helps thousands of people across Latin America find the right insurance coverage in minutes, not days. We're just getting started.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where finding the right insurance is as simple as having a conversation. Where technology bridges the gap between people and protection, making security accessible to all.
